dialogue_lines.speaker: Station Guard
dialogue_lines.text: Sino ang bibisitahin mo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Si Erwin Boy Trip.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Station Guard
dialogue_lines.text: Mag-log muna kayo sa visitor's log. Valid ID, at bawal ang recording devices (BJMP visitation rules).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Noted. Susundin namin ang patakaran.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Station Guard
dialogue_lines.text: Medyo maingay siya minsan. Kaya ninyo ba?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: Hoy, naririnig ko kayo. Hindi naman ako speaker system.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: Uy, abogado! Kala mo ha, may entrance fee ang ngiti mo.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Paano kita kakalimutan? Ikaw pa. Pero seryoso tayo ngayon.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: Sige na nga. Pero pwede bang may konting tawa? Bawal ba 'yon sa Rule 130?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Bawal ang corny. Pero sige, proceed ka na bago ko i-cite ang CPRA sa 'yo.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Erwin, tandaan mo — may due process (1987 Const. Art. III, Sec. 1).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: At may presumption of innocence (Sec. 14(2)).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: At burden ay nasa prosecution (Rule 133).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Hindi tayo hula; ebidensya ang usapan (Rule 130).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Kamusta ka? Matagal na tayong 'di nagkita.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: Ayos lang... kung ayos ang tawag sa kulungan. Pero sige — buhay pa rin.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Hindi ka 'yan. Hindi ikaw ang gumawa nito.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Pero may mga bagay na di nagtutugma...

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: Gets. Kahit kaibigan tayo, magdududa ka pa rin. Tama lang 'yan.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Ano bang nakita mo noong gabing nangyari 'yon kay Leo?

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: May sigaw at parang may nagtulakan.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: May narinig akong yabag na mabilis palayo.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: Madilim, walang klarong sandata.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: 'Yung CCTV sa koridor daw — sira sabi ng pulis.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Kailangan natin ng preliminary investigation (Rule 112).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: At ayusin ang impormasyon kung aabot (Rule 110).

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: Ilagay natin lahat sa maayos na case theory.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Celine
dialogue_lines.text: CPRA (2023) — panindigan ang pagiging patas at tapat.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Station Guard
dialogue_lines.text: Time's up. Tapos na ang bisita.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Erwin Boy Trip
dialogue_lines.text: Miguel, tulungan mo 'ko. Alam mong hindi ako 'to. Huwag mo 'kong pabayaan.

dialogue_lines.speaker: Miguel
dialogue_lines.text: Gagawin ko ang kaya ko. Katotohanan ang habol natin.
